meanings.definition: The round or match preceding the final in a sports tournament.
meanings.sent1: The semifinals are always so exciting to watch.
meanings.sent2: The team made it to the semifinals after a tough season.
meanings.sent3: During the semifinals, the players were nervous but also determined.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the semifinals felt like reaching the peak of a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly as the semifinals began.

meanings.definition: The last four competitors or teams remaining in a tournament.
meanings.sent1: In the semifinals, only the best teams compete.
meanings.sent2: The semifinals will determine who moves on to the final round.
meanings.sent3: The semifinals were like a battle of giants, each team fighting for victory.
meanings.sent4: Being in the semifinals meant the competitors were among the elite few.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the air was palpable as the semifinals approached.
